---
id: get-mapping-value
title: "Program mapping value"
description: "Retrieves a mapping value given the name of the mapping and the associated key. The available mappings for a given program can be obtained via the /program/{programID}/mappings query."

---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Program mapping value"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/program/{programID}/mapping/{mappingName}/{key}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a mapping value given the name of the mapping and the associated key. The available mappings for a given program can be obtained via the /program/\{programID\}/mappings query.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"programID","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"mappingName","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"key","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"metadata","in":"query","required":false,"schema":{"type":"boolean","default":false}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
